title: GitLab security advisory (AV25-412)
description: On July 9, 2025, GitLab published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)  versions prior to 18.1.2, 18.0.4 and 17.11.6
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)  versions prior to 18.1.2, 18.0.4 and 17.11.6
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
